text: God save Meghan Markle! The Duchess Of Sussex has run into some issues when it comes to her royal behavior, but she has her husband Prince Harry to support her through it! Meghan Markle was just accused of breaking royal protocol and “ disrespecting the Queen ” when she crossed her legs at a royal engagement. Shortly after, she attempted to hold Prince Harry ’ s hand in public — which just isn ’ t what the royals do. Still, she ’ s only been a Duchess for a month and a half, so the Royal Family is cutting her some slack, even though she ’ s incredibly hard on herself. “ Meghan does worry about messing up, she worries terribly, because she wants to do everything perfectly, so she really beats herself up when she gets even the tiniest thing wrong.
